topics.body: But the biggest achievement is the tyrannospidershark. It's a mixture of _T. rex_, megalodon and tarantula DNA. It has gills and shark dorsal fins and tail, a _T. rex_ head and jaws with venom, silk and spider legs. It is 60 feet long and can survive a nuclear bomb blast.
